dsf:From.dsf:SQL: LEFT JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCat2 ON ftvCat2.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCategoryLevel2Ident
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCat3 ON ftvCat3.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCategoryLevel3Ident
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCat4 ON ftvCat4.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCategoryLevel4Ident
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCat5 ON ftvCat5.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCategoryLevel5Ident
LEFT JOIN dbo.Account as accRep on accRep.ID = itsReq.ReporterAccountID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Account as accAsg on accAsg.ID = itsReq.AssignedAccountID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMGeneralResolutionMethodType as genResMetTyp on genResMetTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMGeneralResolutionMethodTypeGuid AND genResMetTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentTypeCode as secIncTypCod on secIncTypCod.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentTypeCodeGuid AND secIncTypCod.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentUrgencyCategory as secIncUrgCat on secIncUrgCat.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentUrgencyCategoryGuid AND secIncUrgCat.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentPriorityLevel as secIncPriLev on secIncPriLev.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentPriorityLevelGuid AND secIncPriLev.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID

LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentResponseProcedureType as secIncResProTyp on secIncResProTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentResponseProcedureTypeGuid AND secIncResProTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentClassificationType as secIncClaTyp on secIncClaTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentClassificationTypeGuid AND secIncClaTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentAffectedUserCount as secIncAffUseCou on secIncAffUseCou.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentAffectedUserCountGuid AND secIncAffUseCou.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentRootCauseType as secIncRooCauTyp on secIncRooCauTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentRootCauseTypeGuid AND secIncRooCauTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID

LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentAffectedInformationClass as secIncAffInfCla on secIncAffInfCla.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentAffectedInformationClassGuid AND secIncAffInfCla.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Account as accImmCorActReq on accImmCorActReq.ID = itsReq.ImmediateCorrectiveActionRequestorID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentControlType as secIncIncConTyp on secIncIncConTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentControlTypeGuid AND secIncIncConTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentControlStatus as secIncConSta on secIncConSta.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentControlStatusGuid AND secIncConSta.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentControlPriority as secIncConPri on secIncConPri.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentControlPriorityGuid AND secIncConPri.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN dbo.Account as accSecIncReq on accSecIncReq.ID = itsReq.SecurityIncidentRequestorID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentBreachVectorType as secIncBreVecTyp on secIncBreVecTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentBreachVectorTypeGuid AND secIncBreVecTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentThreatActorType as secIncThrActTyp on secIncThrActTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentThreatActorTypeGuid AND secIncThrActTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID

LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentLogicalIntrusionType as secIncLogIntTyp on secIncLogIntTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentLogicalIntrusionTypeGuid AND secIncLogIntTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID

LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentKeyBusinessImpactType as secIncKeyBusImpTyp on secIncKeyBusImpTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentKeyBusinessImpactTypeGuid AND secIncKeyBusImpTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentOutcomeType as secIncOutTyp on secIncOutTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentOutcomeTypeGuid AND secIncOutTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentTheftCategory as secIncTheCat on secIncTheCat.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentTheftCategoryGuid AND secIncTheCat.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentFailureCategory as secIncFaiCat on secIncFaiCat.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentFailureCategoryGuid AND secIncFaiCat.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID

LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentResolutionMethodType as secIncResMetTyp on secIncResMetTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentResolutionMethodTypeGuid AND secIncResMetTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentImpactCategory as secIncImpCat on secIncImpCat.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentImpactCategoryGuid AND secIncImpCat.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID

DataSource.SQL: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, #ROWNUM# FROM ( SELECT itsReq.ID #ADDCOLUMN# FROM usr.ITSMSecurityIncident AS itsReq INNER JOIN dbo.Account AS accCreator ON accCreator.ID = itsReq.AccountID INNER JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCom ON ftvCom.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCompanyIdent #ADDFROM# WHERE itsReq.[State] != @DeletedState AND ( ( ftvCom.IsShareAmongAuthors = 0 AND #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)|ITSMSecurityIncidentReporter|]# ) OR ( ftvCom.IsShareAmongAuthors = 1 AND #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)|ITSMSecurityIncidentReporter,ITSMAuthor|]# ) OR ( #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)]# ) ) #FILTER# ) AS tbl ) AS tbl WHERE RowNum BETWEEN @StartPage AND @EndPage

CountDataSource.SQL: SELECT COUNT(itsReq.ID) FROM usr.ITSMSecurityIncident AS itsReq INNER JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCom ON ftvCom.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCompanyIdent WHERE itsReq.[State] != @DeletedState AND ( ( ftvCom.IsShareAmongAuthors = 0 AND #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)|ITSMSecurityIncidentReporter|]# ) OR ( ftvCom.IsShareAmongAuthors = 1 AND #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)|ITSMSecurityIncidentReporter,ITSMAuthor|]# ) OR ( #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)]# ) ) #FILTER#

LEFT JOIN dbo.Account as accImmCorActReq on accImmCorActReq.ID = itsReq.ImmediateCorrectiveActionRequestorID
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMSecurityIncidentControlType as secIncIncConTyp on secIncIncConTyp.Guid = itsReq.ITSMSecurityIncidentControlTypeGuid AND secIncIncConTyp.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID

DataSource.SQL: SELECT itsReq.ID #ADDCOLUMN# FROM usr.ITSMSecurityIncident AS itsReq INNER JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCom ON ftvCom.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCompanyIdent INNER JOIN dbo.Account AS accCreator ON accCreator.ID = itsReq.AccountID #ADDFROM# WHERE itsReq.[State] != @DeletedState AND ( ( ftvCom.IsShareAmongAuthors = 0 AND #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)|ITSMSecurityIncidentReporter|]# ) OR ( ftvCom.IsShareAmongAuthors = 1 AND #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)|ITSMSecurityIncidentReporter,ITSMAuthor|]# ) OR ( #PERMISSION[ITSMSecurityIncident(itsReq)]# ) ) #FILTER#
